title: Frost Kisses
description: Feyland is thrown into turmoil once again as the Summer Queen Breena s fate leaves the land of strong, beautiful, and dangerous fairies in chaos. An emerging danger has arisen deep in Feyland, and all must take sides. Sacrifices will be made, and not everyone will survive. How far would you go for love? With a purchase of Frost Kisses in Kindle or paperback, receive a free gift - while supplies last, and get a chance to enter to WIN a cool Grand Prize. Ways to enter is found within the book itself. Also included in Frost Kisses is the first chapters of DESIRE, a new Dystopian Series from Kailin Gow.Book 1: Bitter Frost  (Bitter Frost #1: Frost Series) - AvailableBook 2:  Forever Frost (Bitter Frost #2: Frost Series) - AvailableBook 3:  Silver Frost (Bitter Frost #3: Frost Series) - AvailableBook 4:  Frost Kisses (Bitter Frost #4: Frost Series) - AvailableBook 5: Midnight Frost (Bitter Frost #5: Frost Series) - Fall 2011Standalone   The Fairy Letters from Winter Prince Kian to Breena (Frost Series Novel) - July 2011Related The Wolf Fey - AvailableThe Red Wolf (The Wolf Fey #2) - Summer 2011
author: Kailin Gow
